name: Football: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
description:
In the Breakthrough Gaming Arcade series, play arcade games that express a Biblical truth, complete with retro graphics and sounds!

This game illustrates the fact that we need to not let bad things get in the way of us doing what God wants us to do! Based on Hebrews Chapter 12 in the Bible!

Football: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade © 2007-2024 Myron Kevan Tynes Jr. / Breakthrough Gaming LLC. All Rights Reserved.

This game was released on Sunday, March 31st, 2024 as part of week 158 of Bible Video Game Sundays. Bible Video Game Sundays is an event by Breakthrough Gaming where a new video game releases every Sunday Morning @ 6:00 AM Eastern Time*! (*release dates and times subject to change)
